name: octohub
description: GitHub Notifications & Activities on your Desktop

scripts.dev: yarn workspace @octohub/desktop compile && concurrently --kill-others "yarn workspace @octohub/desktop compile -w" "yarn workspace @octohub/web start" "yarn workspace @octohub/mobile start" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && yarn workspace @octohub/desktop start"
scripts.dev:desktop: cross-env BROWSER=none concurrently "yarn dev:web" "yarn workspace @octohub/desktop compile -w" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && yarn workspace @octohub/desktop start"
scripts.dev:landing: yarn workspace @octohub/web compile && concurrently --kill-others "yarn workspace @octohub/web compile -w" "cd ./landing && yarn start && cd -"
scripts.dev:mobile: yarn workspace @octohub/mobile compile && concurrently --kill-others "yarn workspace @octohub/mobile compile -w" "yarn workspace @octohub/mobile start"
scripts.dev:web: yarn workspace @octohub/web compile && concurrently --kill-others "yarn workspace @octohub/web compile -w" "yarn workspace @octohub/web start"
